fields.name: ConflictResolutionPolicy
fields.description: The conflict resolution policy for the container.

fields.name: Etag
fields.description: A system generated property representing the resource etag required for optimistic concurrency control.

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Name of the Cosmos DB SQL container

fields.name: IndexingPolicy
fields.description: The configuration of the indexing policy. By default, the indexing is automatic for all document paths within the container

fields.name: PartitionKey
fields.description: The configuration of the partition key to be used for partitioning data into multiple partitions

fields.name: Rid
fields.description: A system generated property. A unique identifier.

fields.name: Ts
fields.description: A system generated property that denotes the last updated timestamp of the resource.

fields.name: UniqueKeyPolicy
fields.description: The unique key policy configuration for specifying uniqueness constraints on documents in the collection in the Azure Cosmos DB service.
